name: ir.actions.server,help
value: Envoie le sondage de rappel ISC

name: email.template,subject
src: CSI Survey: ${object.name} for ${object.partner_id != False and object.partner_id.name or object.contact_name}
value: Sondage ISC : ${object.name} pour ${object.partner_id != False and object.partner_id.name or object.contact_name}

name: email.template,body_html
src: Contract ${object.name} is signed. Please send the CSI survey to: ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}
value: Contrat ${object.name} est signé. Envoyer le sondage ISC à: ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}

name: email.template,subject
src: Reminder - CSI Survey: ${object.name} for ${object.partner_id != False and object.partner_id.name or object.contact_name}
value: Rappel - ISC Sondage: ${object.name} pour ${object.partner_id != False and object.partner_id.name or object.contact_name}

name: email.template,body_html
src:
The contract ${object.name} has been live since: ${object.live_date != False an object.live_date or ''} 
If applicable, please resend the CSI survey to: ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}
value:
Le contrat ${object.name} est livré depuis: ${object.live_date != False and object.live_date or ''} 
Si appliquable, envoyer à nouveau à: ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}
